thread.title: Local shelter is working to make sure no family goes hungry
thread.title_full: Local shelter is working to make sure no family goes hungry

author: 13abc
title: Local shelter is working to make sure no family goes hungry
text:
TOLEDO (13abc Action News) - A local shelter is working to make sure no family goes hungry.
Leaders at Family House unveiled a new kitchen and dining facility Tuesday.
Family House used to have a catered service.
But a few years ago, funding issues forced that to stop.
The community came together to provide a place where families can get warm meals.
The kitchen facility is named after Lonnell McClain, a longtime employee who died unexpectedly this year.
The director says he was like a brother, and this kitchen represents his compassionate spirit.
